str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.
Pain, grief, sorrow, affliction. Apparently a primary word; sadness.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
